name: Dark Gyarados
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Normally found only in the deep ocean, it has recently been seen in shallow waters as well.

abilities.name: Final Beam
abilities.effect: When Dark Gyarados is Knocked Out by an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this power does 20 damage for each {W} Energy attached to Dark Gyarados to the Pokémon that Knocked Out Dark Gyarados. Apply Weakness and Resistance. This power doesn’t work if Dark Gyarados is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
